title: 4 DAY BUT NO RESPONCE FROM RIOT SUPPORT.
body: no responce from riot support. i wrote ticket but no reply at all

replies.body: I looked into this for you and see that you currently have two tickets open.  One has been escalated to our account team who will review this case and help you out.  The other will likely be closed to prevent delay or confusion in responding to you.  Until then, don't reply to your ticket until you've received a response, otherwise it may drop you back to the bottom of the queue.  Hang tight, and you'll receive a response as soon as possible!
